website_summaries.verdict: Spot-cooling unit that works though evaporative cooling, a more natural and less expensive way to cool down than mounted units.
pros: For spot cooling of small areas
Honeycomb-design form of cooling with robust 200 CFM air flow
Ice packs and detachable water tank provided for faster cooling
Easy to move about, with handle on top and caster wheels on base
Does not utilize a compressor system to cool, making this unit more efficient
cons: If humidity is higher than 60%, this is not the best choice
Unit actually releases moisture (can be used as a humidifier)
Only should be used in areas with cross-ventilation

customer_reviews.title: Works very well!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! This cooler came in yesterday and we started using it right away. We just moved from Texas to Colorado and we are still dealing with heat. Of course here in CO, there is no A/C and as we all know, heat rises. Although not as humid as TX, it's still in the mid 90s here and I want relief. This awesome little cooler kept us cool the entire day/evening. I love the low level noise it puts out, helps me sleep. I love it and am glad I purchased it, not bad for the price!
customer_reviews.author: AnnieDoll

customer_reviews.title: Far worse than a regular fan
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the other 1 star reviews because it doesn't work at all! The ice packs don't make the air any cooler and my regular fan is stronger, so what is the point? Biggest waste of money ever since it is nonreturnable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Batteries required.
customer_reviews.text: Very good device! Batteries required for Remote Control only! Hee...ee...
customer_reviews.author: Ban N.

customer_reviews.title: It works great and is relatively quiet even when set on high ...
customer_reviews.text: It works great and is relatively quiet even when set on high speed. The only flaw I find is that it is a little more bulkier than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't recommend at all
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't do too well to cool a room down. Takes forever to feel any difference. Makes room really humid which will promote mold growth if you don't ventilate the room well so be careful! air only comes out from the left half of the front, the directional shade doesn't do too much to direct the air flow so the height range of the airflow is quite limited. Honestly regretted buying this...
customer_reviews.author: Jason Huang

customer_reviews.title: Piece of trash and non-returnable
customer_reviews.text: Does not work at all. as a cooler. It is just an expensive fan and would not work as stated by the website description. Worst part that it is not returnable.
customer_reviews.author: HT

customer_reviews.title: Bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: I did not like it, it didn’t cool a small room even with the ice pack. I try to return it but it was not returnable an less it was broken, I only used it twice. Bad purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Water tank leaks.
customer_reviews.text: Started to leak water after a few months. The ice packs do not help to cool a room. Pass on purchasing this inferior item.
customer_reviews.author: Dega724

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Cools well. Bigger than expected. Not good for small areas
customer_reviews.author: JJR

customer_reviews.title: NOT RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had not missed the return date. Do not recommend as it barely cooled a small bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: It's cooler.
customer_reviews.text: I am satisfied with this Coolor. It provides a strong air stream, and it's attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Marla B. Weil

customer_reviews.title: NO five stars on first day:-)
customer_reviews.text: First. The item arrived at my door front on time. Thanks to UPS(Gardena, Ca: The best in my area.....for me. The unit is compact with easy to follow instructions. The unit is light weight and seems to be durable with proper handling. Easy communications btwn unit and remote control. 2 small re-freezable ice pack cartridges should help. Bottom line/Acid test. Will this unit maintain a ambient temperature below 80F on a room less than 300 sq ft.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Buttram

customer_reviews.title: Adequate for small space cooling.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as the item discription says. This water cooler was purchased for our bedroom use. Approximately 300 sq ft. We live in a manufactured home for you country folks. Unfortunately, if temps are above 90 degrees during the day, it does not provide sufficient cooling capacity, even for a small bedroom. It has a handle on the top which makes it easy to roll around. We froze the cooling blocks, wich were included, to keep the water colder. Thinking it would be better for my office, 200 sq ft.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kirklin

customer_reviews.title: Works in locations with low humidity and helps air conditioners function better.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this item. It last for a few hours on one tank and as stated it will not cool your house like an air conditioner but it will put enough humidity back into the air to allow fans and air conditioners to do their job more efficiently. The nice thing is you can use this year round, during the winter heaters dry rooms out and this will keep it moist enough so your lungs do not dry out.
customer_reviews.author: James M Dakis

customer_reviews.title: Great for a hot room, self contained no drain lines!
customer_reviews.text: We have a room that gets sun from noon to 6pm, so it’s our hottest room in the house. To help a/c and ceiling fan, I purchased this unit with skepticism. It actually keeps the room cooler and no drain lines, it’s self contained and uses frozen packs, included. It can also be used as a fan in fall without ice packs. Awesome unit!!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Church

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: It’s just a huge piece of junk; my small Vornado fan works better. I got this because I had surgery, and the heat was going to be bad for a week. Houses near the ocean don’t have AC, but I didn’t want to spend $400 for the portable AC unit. I could have just toughed it out if I had known this thing was worthless. There is no diff whether it’s dry air or if you put the water and ice in... how is that possible lol
customer_reviews.author: E. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Read the manual book before start using it!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this evaporative air cooler I started using it right away and is saving my summer here in Southern California. I use this in my bedroom only, it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't cool down the room at all and now I can't return it. I am going to throw it away as I would feel terrible selling this useless device to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Keeps room cool
customer_reviews.text: Surprised that it will keep a room cool, not cold. Works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Wiseman

customer_reviews.title: Non-returnable item not mentioned anywhere prior to sale
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this cooler during our recent heat wave in southern CA. Since I live in my RV a window a/c unit is not an option. Ths "cooler" doesn't cool to 20-30° lower temp. as advertised. Called Honeywell twice & talked with 2 technicians who told me to return item to Amazon. Amazon customer service rep explained the item was 'not returnable.' Furious bc no mention of that in description of item. After becoming angry & speaking to 2 supervisors, I'm getting my full refund. Beware shoppers bc had I not persisted in being refunded, I'd have been out $152.34 + $38.09 shipping for an item that doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: buys-a-lot

product_meta.title: Honeywell, White 200-255CFM Portable Evaporative Cooler for Personal Spot Cooling with 2 Ice Packs & Remote-CS074AE, Silver, 200 CFM
product_meta.description: Honeywell evaporative air coolers are an and cost-friendly cooling option for your home. Much like a breeze flowing across a lake or the refreshing cool air you feel near a waterfall, air coolers produce a comfortable, cool breeze with the natural process of water evaporation. When warm air is drawn into the Honeywell evaporative cooler, it is filtered through a wet honeycomb cooling medium, which absorbs heat and naturally cools and humidifies the air. A powerful fan pushes the cool air out of the front of the unit into the surrounding area. This no-compressor system cools naturally, efficiently and inexpensively. Evaporative air coolers are more effective in areas with maximum relative humidity of 60% or less. Warm, dry air is important for more effective evaporative cooling and the temperature decrease will be greater in drier environments because higher evaporation occurs when the humidity is low. Evaporative air coolers produce moisture and can be used to increase humidification in a room. Keep windows and/doors open to allow the moist cool air to circulate outside and avoid moisture build up in the room. Evaporative cooling requires cross ventilation and must be placed in a room with open window or doors to operate efficiently.cfm200
feature_bullets: Indoor evaporative air cooler or swamp cooler Ideal for use in the southwest and Midwest regions of the US. Performs best in hot/dry climates where humidity levels are <50%
Super low power consumption & powerful 200-255 CFM airflow ideal for personal spot cooling small targeted areas such as bed, desk area, sofa, dining table
4 fan speeds, Remote Control, Low water alarm, energy saving timer, detachable water tank with 2 re-freezable ice packs included, for faster cooling.
Moist, cool breeze can cool you down & be used as humidification during winter months.
NOT an Air Conditioner & NOT just a Fan – Evaporative Cooler reduces temperature through water evaporation. Mimic the comfort of a cool lake breeze in your home

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars42 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Swamp cooler, remote control, manual, warranty
